tool_description: SQLite can be considered as a “lighter” version of other complex databases.
name: Learn SQLite with Examples
title: Learn SQLite with Examples

api_list.name: SQLite EndPoint
api_list.description: To learn sqlite it will help to get the required content
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://learn-sqlite-with-examples.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learn-sqlite-with-examples.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://learn-sqlite-with-examples.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "learn-sqlite-with-examples.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
